description:
Turtleling is the app that features the magical turtle that everybody loves! The turtle loves performing his "magic trick" but he needs encouragement to do so. You must poke the turtle for him to perform his "trick"! AND tap and hold for more fun!

This app is great for kids! 

New in version 1.2.1 -
 - Fixed bug that made the turtle say tada before he is tapped when the app is launched
 - added about page

New in version 1.2.0 -
 - New images (noticeably the background)
 - New tap and hold feature

Please leave a review and visit our website to help us improve this app and future ones!!!!
versionNote:
- Fixed bug that made the turtle say tada before he is tapped when the app is launched
 - added about page
